attributes.action: have petitions on the website with both "Yes" and "No" options
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sometimes online petitions get hijacked by  vast one-sided media coverage.   

It would be far more balanced if those who had a contrary opinion to the media were able to express it.  A simple "No" option to the petition is all it takes.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
